title: How to Make Cute Candy Creatures for Halloween

steps.headline: Get a pack of starbursts and stack three of the starbursts for the head and body.
Place two candy necklace beads, on top of the stack of starbursts side by side for the eyes.
Under the first starburst place a sour candy belt for the tongue.
Then use two spice drops, for the arms.
Stack two gumdrops on top of each other for head and body.
Stick in two banana shaped runts for the horns.
Use white chocolate chips for the eyes and pull 'n' peel Twizzlers for the pupils.
Cut a mouth in the first gumdrop and place airheads Xtremes for tongue.
Use M&M for pupil, add heart shaped runts for shoes.

text: Izzy Get a pack of starbursts and stack three of the starbursts for the head and body.  Place two candy necklace beads, on top of the stack of starbursts side by side for the eyes.  Under the first starburst place a sour candy belt for the tongue.  Then use two spice drops, for the arms.  Use black icing for nose.  Moo & Boo Stack two gumdrops on top of each other for head and body.  Stick in two banana shaped runts for the horns.  Use white chocolate chips for the eyes and pull 'n' peel Twizzlers for the pupils.  Cut a mouth in the first gumdrop and place airheads Xtremes for tongue.  Dot Use gumball for body.  Use M&M for pupil, add heart shaped runts for shoes.  Use candy sprinkle for mouth
